attributes.action: Force a General Election to allow for an elected Prime Minister of the people.
attributes.additional_details:
Theresa May has so far gone back on promises to limit immigration & free movement, has made budget cuts to police forces, and has failed to invoke Article 50.
She is also responsible for halting the child abuse enquiry, introducing the snoopers charter, says Sharia would be good for the UK and backs the European arrest warrant.
She is currently at the forefront in attempting to relocate 20000 Syrian migrants despite tens of thousands of our own homeless.
This is why an elected PM is needed.
attributes.background: After David Cameron stepped down as PM, there was an opportunity for a Leave side politician to take the helm. Due to MSM stories ridiculing those in the race, which many people believed, we were forced to have a PM that campaigned to stay in the EU.
